content.raw:
Hi all,

I was trying to run the Example Setup, following this tutorial [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup). I had  tested my controller and launch the “teleop.launch". I setup the evironment by following the Catkin workspace setup [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall).

The problem is when I run command `ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_03 robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`. I only get  a small part of the tunnel map with no robot.

Please let me know what I did wrong and how can fix the issue. Thanks in advance.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3893509612-Screenshot_from_2019-07-24_17-47-35.png)
content.html:
Hi all,

I was trying to run the Example Setup, following this tutorial #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup. I had tested my controller and launch the “teleop.launch". I setup the evironment by following the Catkin workspace setup #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupInstall.

The problem is when I run command ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_03 robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1. I only get a small part of the tunnel map with no robot.

Please let me know what I did wrong and how can fix the issue. Thanks in advance.
